name: PsExec Tool Execution From Suspicious Locations - PipeName
description: Detects PsExec default pipe creation where the image executed is located in a suspicious location. Which could indicate that the tool is being used in an attack
false_positives: Rare legitimate use of psexec from the locations mentioned above
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.name:\\PSEXESVC AND process.executable:(*C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*))`
